metadata.title: CVE-2016-3619 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: The DumpModeEncode function in tif_dumpmode.c in the bmp2tiff tool inLibTIFF 4.0.6 and earlier, when the "-c none" option is used, allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (buffer over-read) via a crafted BMPimage.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
